Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Amulet (duck)
Description: Small amulet depicting a duck in the round. The head has disappeared but the body is a composed of a round lump with an elongated section representing the tail.  There is a suspension hole pierced through and through.  The object has three colours.
